post.name: Mark Zuckerberg
post.statusText: By giving people the power to share, we're making the world more transparent.

post.name: Steven Jobs
post.statusText:
Design is not just what it looks and feel like. Design is how it works.

 Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't  matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful, that's what matter to me. 

 Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your innovations.

post.name: Bill Gates
post.statusText:
Live as if you to die tomorrow, learn  as if  you were to live  forever. 
 the  weak can never  forgive. Forgiveness is the  attribute  of the strong. 
 Happiness is when what  you think, what you say, and what you do are  in harmony.
